_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

GoodsCertificate.description: A document that describes a certificate of goods for importation and exportation

GoodsCertificate.title: Goods Certificate. Details
GoodsCertificate.description: A document that describes a certificate of goods for importation and exportation

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Goods Certificate. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Goods Certificate. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Goods Certificate. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Goods Certificate. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Goods Certificate. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Goods Certificate. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Goods Certificate. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Goods Certificate. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

TypeCode.title: Goods Certificate. Type Code. Code
TypeCode.description: A code specifying the type of goods certificate

Description.title: Goods Certificate. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of this goods certificate

Note.title: Goods Certificate. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Goods Certificate. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies the current version of this goods certificate

ValidityPeriod.title: Goods Certificate. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period of time for which this goods certificate is considered valid

ApplicableTerritoryAddress.title: Goods Certificate. Applicable Territory_ Address. Address
ApplicableTerritoryAddress.description: A geographic area where this goods certificate is valid

ExporterParty.title: Goods Certificate. Exporter_ Party. Party
ExporterParty.description: The party who exports the goods or has similar right of disposal over them at the time of export

ImporterParty.title: Goods Certificate. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The party who imports the goods, or on whose behalf the goods are being import

WarehouseParty.title: Goods Certificate. Warehouse_ Party. Party
WarehouseParty.description: The party who is responsible for storing the goods

ConsignorParty.title: Goods Certificate. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The party, usually the seller, who is responsible for the consignment

ConsigneeParty.title: Goods Certificate. Consignee_ Party. Party
ConsigneeParty.description: The party, usually the buyer, who will receive the goods

FreightForwarderParty.title: Goods Certificate. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party
FreightForwarderParty.description: The freight forwarder or the forwarding agent responsible for the transportation of the goods

IssuerParty.title: Goods Certificate. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The party issuing this goods certificate

LegalAuthorityParty.title: Goods Certificate. Legal Authority_ Party. Party
LegalAuthorityParty.description: The legal authority, when different from the issuer, who sanctions this goods certificate

ApplicantParty.title: Goods Certificate. Applicant_ Party. Party
ApplicantParty.description: The party applying for this goods certificate

Shipment.title: Goods Certificate. Shipment
Shipment.description: The shipment for which this goods certificate is issued

Attestation.title: Goods Certificate. Attestation
Attestation.description: Any attestations made for the goods related to this goods certificate

GoodsProcessing.title: Goods Certificate. Goods Processing
GoodsProcessing.description: Any processing that the goods have been undergoing

OriginalDocumentReference.title: Goods Certificate. Original_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginalDocumentReference.description: A reference to the original version of the goods certificate

PreviousDocumentReference.title: Goods Certificate. Previous_ Document Reference. Document Reference
PreviousDocumentReference.description: A reference to the previous version of the goods certificate

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Goods Certificate. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this goods certificate

Signature.title: Goods Certificate. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
